verbs.description: [ARG0: The NRA] [V: claims] [ARG1: the only thing that stops a bad guy with a gun is a good guy with a gun] , but Secret Service rules will prevent its members from bringing guns to appearances by President Donald Trump and Vice President Mike Pence .
